/**
 * a demo main class
 */
export class DemoBase {
    private m_init = true;

    constructor() { }

    initialize(): void {
        console.log("DemoBase::initialize()......");
        if (this.m_init) {
            this.m_init = false;

            document.oncontextmenu = (e): void => {
                e.preventDefault();
            };


        }
    }
    run(): void {
    }
}
export default DemoBase;
